root.name: Mr. Goemon
root.description: Goemon's first (and only) arcade adventure, the goal of the game is to reach the end of every stage while avoiding or defeating the guards that try to stop Goemon. Goemon's main weapon is his pipe, but he can also jump on enemies and pick up and throw items that are scattered throughout the levels. The graphical style of the game is based on the classical Japanese drawing style known as Ukiyo-e, a type of art style used between the 17th and 20th centuries.
